data.name: cbShowMainArticleImageListResource1.Text
data.value: Show main article image in article list

data.name: cbShowMainArticleImageResource1.Text
data.value: Show main article image in article details

data.name: lblApprovingMessageResource1.Text
data.value: After update, article must be approved again.

data.name: lblEventDateErrorResource1.Text
data.value: End date is smaller or equal to start date.

data.name: CopyAndPaste.Text
data.value: Copy and paste this token into the article's content field.

data.name: lblArticleCSSStyle.HelpText
data.value: Select a display style for the selected theme.

data.name: lblArticleDetailsTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Select a HTML template. A HTML template is responsible for an article details layout. HTML templates can be edited in the template editor (Dashboard > Templates).

data.name: lblArticleDetailsTheme.HelpText
data.value: Select a theme for article details.

data.name: lblArticleSummary.HelpText
data.value: Enter the article summary in this field. An article summary is usually used as a short introduction in an article in an article list. The HTML editor that is used for editing this field is the editor which is set as the default editor in DNN.

data.name: lblArticleTags.HelpText
data.value: Add article tags in this field. Tags are separated by comma. By clicking the Add existing tags button we can add tags that have already been added in articles. Article tags are optional.

data.name: lblArticleURL.HelpText
data.value: SEO friendly links are automatically created based on the article title. Here you can change the automatically generated link if you want. By clicking the Reset article button the URL returns to the automatically generated link before any changes you made.

data.name: lblCLArticle.HelpText
data.value: Enter the article content in this field. An article content is shown when we open an article. The HTML editor that is used for editing this field is the editor that is set as the default editor in DNN.

data.name: lblCLSummary.HelpText
data.value: Enter the article summary in this field. An article summary is usually used as a short introduction in an article in an article list. The HTML editor that is used for editing this field is the editor which is set as the default editor in DNN.

data.name: lblContent.HelpText
data.value: Enter the article content in this field. An article content is shown when we open an article. The HTML editor that is used for editing this field is the editor that is set as the default editor in DNN.

data.name: lblContentLocalizationSelectLanguage.HelpText
data.value: Select the language you want to edit. There is no need to edit default language.

data.name: lblExpireDate.HelpText
data.value: An expire date is time when the article will no longer be shown. Here you enter a date and time.

data.name: lblFeaturedArticle.HelpText
data.value: If this option is ticked, then the article will be marked as featured.

data.name: lblPublishDate.HelpText
data.value: A publish date is time when the article starts to show. Here you enter a date and time.

data.name: Note.Text
data.value: Note: If you don\'t set this text, the token won\'t render as a standard text link.

data.name: Showastandardtextlink.Text
data.value: Show as a standard text link

data.name: CopyAndPasteToken.Text
data.value: Copy and paste the token into the content section of the article.

data.name: Mainarticlemapisnotset.Text
data.value: No main article map in this article yet

data.name: Thegalleryisempty.Text
data.value: No gallery in this article yet

data.name: ThisImage.Text
data.value: This image is selected as main article image

data.name: GalleryWithArticle.Text
data.value: This gallery is displayed in the article

data.name: NotWithArticle.Text
data.value: This gallery is not displayed within the article

data.name: addVideoFromYouTube.Text
data.value: Add a video from YouTube, Vimeo or Wistia:

data.name: lblArticleCommentsTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Select a HTML template for comments. HTML templates can be edited in the template editor (Dashboard > Templates).

data.name: DeleteArticleConfirm.Text
data.value: Are you certain you want to delete this article?

data.name: Permissionsperarticleoverride.Text
data.value: Permissions per article override all other permissions

data.name: Youdonothavepermision.Text
data.value: You do not have permission to edit this article.

data.name: YouAreNotAllowed.Text
data.value: You are not allowed to edit this article

data.name: lblHideDefaultLocale.Text
data.value: Do not display this article on the default language:

data.name: ArticleTokens.Text
data.value: [EasyDNNnews:PageBreak] - Creates an article page break. [ReadMore] - Breaks article in article list. [EasyDNNnews:PaidContentStart] - Marks the start of paid content. [EasyDNNnews:PaidContentEnd]- Marks the end of paid content. [EasyDNNnews:UnPaidContentEnd] - Marks the end of un paid content. [EasyDNNnewsSystemToken:SysFacebookLikeButton] - Inserts Facebook like button. [EasyDNNnewsSystemToken:SysTwitter]- Inserts Twitter button. [EasyDNNnewsSystemToken:SysGooglePlus] - Inserts Google plus button. [EasyDNNnewsSystemToken:SysFacebookShareButton] - Inserts Facebook share button. [EasyDNNnewsSystemToken:SysAddThis] - Inserts AddThis sharing service button.

data.name: lblHideDefaultLocale.Help
data.value: By turning on this option article can be excluded from displaying on the default language. For example on the sites with three different languages: English (default), German and Italian. Article is translated only to Italian language and it doesn’t need to be show on the default language. Hint: You can also turn off showing articles on German language if it is not translated. Go to Module settings > Main Display Settings and turn on option “Do not show articles if they do not have translation for selected language”

data.name: lblCFGroupSelection.HelpText
data.value: Select custom fields group. Only one group per article can be selected and saved.

data.name: lblLightboxGalleryResizeMethod.HelpText
data.value: Select resize method to use when generating thumbnails for images.

data.name: liCropAndPropotional.Text
data.value: Resize and crop horizontal, proportionally resize vertical images

data.name: lblChameleonResponsiveMainImageWidth.HelpText
data.value: Max width used to generate main responsive image.

data.name: DocumentArticleLink_SqlConnectionError.Text
data.value: An error occurred while connecting to the database.

data.name: DocumentArticleLink_ExistingDocumentAdded.Text
data.value: The existing document has been added.

data.name: rfvExistingLinksID.ErrorMessage
data.value: Please specify an existing document ID.

data.name: cvExistingLinksID.ErrorMessage
data.value: The existing link ID must be an integer.

data.name: cvExistingDocumentID.ErrorMessage
data.value: Document ID must be an integer

data.name: revEndsAfterOcurrences.ErrorMessage
data.value: Only positive numbers. Zero is not allowed.

data.name: revUpcomingOccurrences.ErrorMessage
data.value: Only positive numbers. Zero is not allowed.

data.name: lblDetailsDocumentsTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Select a HTML template for the documents section. The documents section is a part of an article list or details which is used for displaying documents which are added in an article with a help of Document option in Add-Edit Article Form. HTML templates can be edited in the template editor (Dashboard > Templates).

data.name: lblDetailsLinksTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Select a HTML template for the links section. The links section is a part of an article list or details which is used for displaying documents which are added in an article with a help of Links option in Add-Edit Article Form. HTML templates can be edited in the template editor (Dashboard > Templates).

data.name: lblDetailsRelatedArticlesTemplate.HelpText
data.value: Select a HTML template for the related articles section. The related articles section is a part of an article list or details which displays related articles. HTML templates can be edited in the template editor (Dashboard > Templates).

data.name: UpdateToEnableEditRecurrance.Text
data.value: To enable editing of recurring events update article.

data.name: lblRegistrationOnEvent.Help
data.value: Turn this option on if you would like to enable the user registration to the event. This option is not possible to turn off afterwards if there is an existing registration to the event.

data.name: lblEventMaxNumberOfTickets.Help
data.value: The maximum number of seats (attendants) who can apply for the event. 0 is unlimited.

data.name: revMaxNumberOfTickets.ErrorMessag
data.value: Only positive numbers. Zero is for all.

data.name: lblEnableRegistration.Help
data.value: Determine the time when the user registrations are enabled. The first possible choice is 'After publish date' which means that the registrations are possible immediately after publishing. The second choice is 'Number of days before event' where we can set the number of days before the beginning of an event when registration is enabled.

data.name: liNumberofdaysbeforeeventstartdate.Text
data.value: Number of days before event start date

data.name: revEnableDaysBeforeStartDate.ErrorMessage
data.value: Only positive numbers. Zero is for all.

data.name: lblDisableRegistration.Help
data.value: Determine the time when the possibility of registration ends. The first possible choice is 'When events starts' which means that registrations are closed at the beginning of the holding event. The second possible day is 'Number of days before event' where we can set number of days before the event starts when the further registration will be disabled.

data.name: revDisableDaysBeforeStartDate.ErrorMessage
data.value: Only positive numbers. Zero is for all.

data.name: lblTicketsUserCanRegister.Help
data.value: Here you can determine how many seats a single user can register. If the option 'Unlimited' is chosen, then the user can register unlimited number of seats. If the option 'Mix-Max value' is chosen then it is possible to set the minimum and maximum number of seats a single user can register.

data.name: revEventRegisterMinTickets.ErrorMessage
data.value: Only positive numbers. Zero is for all.

data.name: revEventRegisterMaxTickets.ErrorMessage
data.value: Only positive numbers. Zero is for all.

data.name: lblRegistrationType.Help
data.value: Here you can choose a type of registration. If the option 'Registration on site is necessary' is chosen then the user has to be registered on site or has to register. If the option 'Registration on site is not necessary' is chosen, then users can register to an event without the need to be registered on the site. Besides this option, it is also necessary to set which users have the possibility of registration in the module settings (Settings > 1. Permissions > Allow Event registration).

data.name: liRegistrationonsiteisnotnecessary.Text
data.value: Registration on site is not necessary

data.name: lblEventRegistrationRole.Help
data.value: Here we can set the possibility of adding a certain DNN security role for a user after the registration. If the selected option is 'None', then user is not added to a security role. If the option 'Select role' is marked, then we can choose a role to which user is added after the registration.

data.name: lblRegistrationApproval.Help
data.value: If this option is turned on then approval is required for the submitted registrations.

data.name: lblDisableFurtherRegistration.Help
data.value: If this option is turned on, further registrations are disabled regardless the duration set in the settings.

data.name: lblShowRegistredUsersRole.Help
data.value: Here we can set to whom the list of registered user is visible. If the option 'None' is chosen, then the list is not visible to anyone. When the option 'All' is chosen, then the list is visible to all, and if the option 'Select role' is chosen, then we can choose a security role to which the list is visible.

data.name: lblRegistrationCFtemplateID.Help
data.value: Here you can choose a group of custom fields for registration form. A group of custom fields is created in Dashboard > Custom fields.

data.name: lblSendInvitations.Help
data.value: If this option is turned on, then the event will use the default settings for invitations. The default settings are valid for the whole portal. Additional changes and adjustments of the invitations are possible.

data.name: lblSendReminders.Help
data.value: If this option is turned on, then the event will use the default settings for reminders. The default settings are valid for the whole portal. Additional changes and adjustments of reminders are possible.

data.name: lblReccuringInEditMode.Help
data.value: If this option is switched on, it is possible to edit a single recurring event from a series of recurring events. Warning: if this option is later switched off, all the changes applied to single recurring events will be lost.

data.name: lblChameleonOpenDetailsInGravityGallery.Text
data.value: Open media details in Gravity gallery:

data.name: lblChameleonOpenDetailsInGravityGallery.Help
data.value: Turn on this option to open media details in Gravity gallery. If you turn on this option you also need to select 'Open details in Gravity gallery' option from lightbox type selection.

data.name: lblChameleonGravityGalleryInstances.Help
data.value: Select Gravity gallery module for full gallery view.

data.name: lbllGravityGalleryInstances.Help
data.value: Select Gravity gallery module for full gallery view.

data.name: lblGravityGallerySelectTemplate.Help
data.value: Select a HTML template for the gravity gallery. This template will be used if the gravity gallery is used for displaying galleries within articles. HTML templates can be edited in the template editor (Dashboard > Templates).

data.name: lblMetaDescription.HelpText
data.value: Enter a meta description for the article. This field is optional.

data.name: lblMetaKeywords.HelpText
data.value: Enter meta keywords for the article. This field is optional.

data.name: DraftArticle.Text
data.value: If this option is chosen then the article is in a draft mode and it is not published.

data.name: PublishArticle.Text
data.value: If this option is chosen then the article will be published.

data.name: galleryPanelTooltip.Text
data.value: Here you can add a gallery and images in the article. The Select images and Start upload images buttons will show up after clicking the Add gallery button. By clicking the Select images button you can choose images from your computer and then upload them by clicking the Start upload button. After the upload, a list of the added images will be shown in this panel.

data.name: documentsIncludedTooltip.Text
data.value: Here you can add documents in articles. Documents added in this way will be shown at the bottom of the article in a document box. By using tokens they can be added directly in the article summary or article content. If you wish to add new documents, choose the Upload new documents option, click on the “Select documents” button and at the end click on the Upload button to upload documents in an article. If you wish to add existing documents then select the option Add existing document, type the beginning of an article title in the “Search document” and choose a document. Click on the Add button. After adding a document, a list of the added documents will be shown in this panel.

data.name: linksTooltip.Text
data.value: Here you can add links in the article. Links that are added in this way will be shown at the end of the article in a links box. By using tokens they can be added in an article summary and content. It is possible to choose several types of links. An external link is a link on an external site. A page link is a link on a page within a site. An article link is a link to an already added article. The option Existing link enables adding of already added links without entering all data again. After adding links, a list of added links will be shown in this panel.

data.name: advancedSettingsTooltip.Text
data.value: Here is possible to choose or to change an article author. Select a DNN security role and then a (new) author.

data.name: isArticleEventTooltip.Text
data.value: If this option is turned on, then the article will be added as an event, meaning that it is necessary to add the Start and End date and it is possible to configure other event related options.

data.name: PleaseEnterValidEventStartTime.Text
data.value: Please enter valid event start time.

data.name: PleaseEnterValidEventEndTime.Text
data.value: Please enter valid event end time.

data.name: EventEndDateAndStartDateAreEqual.Text
data.value: Event end date and start date are equal.

data.name: PublishDateIsGreaterThenExpireDate.Text
data.value: Dates are not valid. Publish date is greater than Expire date.

data.name: RecurringEndDateMustBeGreaterThanStartDate.Text
data.value: Recurring end date must be greater than start date!

data.name: EventPaymentCostDefinitionNotValid.Text
data.value: Event payment cost definition not valid.

data.name: UsersAllreadyRegistratedToEvents.Text
data.value: Users already registered to events. Generating all values is disabled. Edit individual recurrence.

data.name: FixedPriceMustBePositiveNumberOrZero.Text
data.value: Fixed price must be positive number or zero.

data.name: EventPaymentDefineAtLeastOnePrice.Text
data.value: Event payment - define at least one price.

data.name: CanUploadExeComBatFiles.Text
data.value: Can't upload exe, com, bat files

data.name: TheDocumentIdIsntAValidNumber.Text
data.value: The document id isn't a valid number

data.name: ThereWasAnErrorWhileSavingTheDocument.Text
data.value: There was an error while saving the document.

data.name: UpdateArticleAndSaveEventAsRecurringEvent.Text
data.value: To enable editing of recurring events you must update article to save event as recurring event.

data.name: UpdateArticleAndSaveArticleAsEvent.Text
data.value: To enable editing of recurring events you must update article to save article as event.

data.name: TheArticleDoesntExist.Text
data.value: The article doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

data.name: ArticleIDNotValid.Text
data.value: ArticleID not valid. (ArticleID must be an integer).

data.name: AddingTheLinkFailed.Text
data.value: Adding the link failed. An error occurred while adding the link to the database.

data.name: PageNotValid.Text
data.value: Page not valid. (Tabid is not an integer).

data.name: YouCannotAddMoreArtciles.Text
data.value: You cannot add any more articles. You've reached the maximum number of allowed articles.

data.name: TooManyCategoriesSelected.Text
data.value: Too many categories selected. You can select up to {0} category(-ies).

data.name: TooManyTagsAdded.Text
data.value: Too many tags added. You can add up to {0} tag(s).

data.name: YouCanNotAddMoreLinks.Text
data.value: You cannot add more links. You can add up to {0} link(s).

data.name: YouCanNotAddMoreDocuments.Text
data.value: You cannot add more documents. You can add up to {0} document(s).

data.name: YouCanNotAddMoreDocumentsRecurringEvent.Text
data.value: You cannot add more documents to this recurring event. You can add up to {0} document(s).

data.name: YouCanNotAddMoreVideos.Text
data.value: You cannot add more videos. You can add up to {0} video(s).

data.name: YouCanNotUploadMoreImages.Text
data.value: You cannot add upload more images. You can upload up to {0} image(s).

data.name: lblYouCanNotAddMedia.Text
data.value: You cannot upload images or add videos.

data.name: lblTitleTag.Help
data.value: Here you can enter a custom title tag. If the custom tag isn’t entered, then it is automatically generated according to the settings in Dashboard > General settings.

data.name: lbMustSaveBeforeEnable.Text
data.value: To be able to enable the registration process, please save the article first.

data.name: DragAndDropImagesHereOrClickOnSelectImagesButton.Text
data.value: Drag and drop images here or click on Select images button

data.name: lblGIImagesResize.Help
data.value: Resize and crop images. If un-checked images will be resized proportionaly.

data.name: lblChameleonResizeMethod.HelpText
data.value: Select resize method to use when generating thumbnails for imaes.

data.name: lblByAttendeesCost.Help
data.value: Localize cost names. Article must be saved before localizing cost names.

data.name: lblCostPerBooking.Help
data.value: The cost per booking, regardless to the number of attendees.

data.name: lblCostPerAttendee.Help
data.value: The cost per attendee, you can have many pricing tiers.

data.name: lblBulkDiscount.Help
data.value: The discount policy when there are more than 1 attendees, you can enter either a number like 1.5 or a percentage like 10%.

data.name: DragAndDropDocumentsHere.Text
data.value: Drag and drop documents here or click on Select documents button
